'Hmmm...'%K%P
Shuri had been staring at her phone for a while now.%K%P
'What's wrong, Shuri?\nYou worried about the stock market or something?'%K%P
'Um, no? I'm waiting for my sister to answer me.'%K%P
'I'm not really sure,\nbut won't it buzz or something when it comes?'%K%P
'Well, yeah...'%K%P
She didn't need to sit there and have this\nstaring contest with her phone.%K%P
Shuri was fully aware of this.%K%P
'Let it be, come on, let's have a toast!'%K%P
'Oh ho, that's right!\nShuri, put that down and pick up a glass!'%K%P
'Well, since both members of Love☆Kami made it to\nthe finals, congratulations!'%K%P
'Cheers!'%K%P
The day after the qualifier results were announced,\nthe three of us met up at Kagura's work to celebrate.%K%P
While it was hard to be completely happy due to\nSara's announcement, I thought it would be a good way\nto cheer everyone up.%K%P
'I'm just glad we made it through the qualifier!'%K%P
'You were touch and go until the very end, though.'%K%P
'Yeah, I'm jealous, you were set early on!\nI was on edge the whole time, you know.'%K%P
'Well, I'm glad you made it!\nCongratulations, Kagura.'%K%P
'Thanks. Congrats to you too, Shuri!'%K%P
Things finally started to feel normal\nafter we enjoyed a nice meal.%K%P
Shuri's dark mood even lightened up again.%K%P
Now that the celebration had settled down,\nit was time to think about the main event.%K%P
'OK then, now that we're headed to the main audition,\nWe need to talk about what we're going to do...'%K%P
We had about one month until the audition.\nLove☆Kami had built a lot of popularity, but in\nterms of actual skill we still had cause for concern.%K%P
From now on the fanbases would be irrelevant,\nand it would become purely a contest of ability.%K%P
'That practice spot has gotten famous, apparently.\nWith all the fans there,\nit might be kind of hard to use.'%K%P
'You can't let attention from the fans bother you.\nIf you get embarrassed by a little attention,\nyou won't be able to survive in L☆SEVEN.'%K%P
'Shuri's right.\nAnyway, isn't it good to feel a little tension?'%K%P
'Well, if that's the way it is,\nthen we could just borrow the stage here again.'%K%P
Love☆Kami had given a performance here\nduring the final push at the end of the qualifiers.%K%P
Since Kagura worked here, they were accommodating.%K%P
'More importantly, just how long do we plan to\ncontinue with Love☆Kami?\nWe two are competitors in the main voting, you know.'%K%P
'...I guess that means we can't do this together?'%K%P
'Of course it does.'%K%P
Shuri turned a cold shoulder to Kagura's hinting.%K%P
She clearly thought they shouldn't keep up their duo.%K%P
'Well, even if we're rivals\nwe're still friends, right?'%K%P
'...I'd certainly like to think so. What about you?'%K%P
'Of course, me too!\nShuri, you've been my bestie for ages!'%K%P
The rather casual re-ranking to 'bestie' aside,\nKagura seemed happy to be able to\nreaffirm their friendship.%K%P
'This means I can go ahead and compete with you.'%K%P
'I'm looking forward to it.\nLet's show each other our very best performance!'%K%P
The two came to an understanding\nthanks to Shuri's guidance.%K%P
'And so, what'll happen to Love☆Kami?'%K%P
'I guess we'll go on break?'%K%P
'Yeah, if I'm going to beat Shuri,\nI'll have to really buckle down.'%K%P
So there were no objections from Kagura, either.%K%P
'OK then, what about me?'%K%P
'I'm sorry, I totally forgot about you...'%K%P
'Don't forget me!\nI fought alongside you in the qualifier, too!'%K%P
Love☆Kami wasn't just two people, it was a trio.\nWhere did all that heartfelt support go?%K%P
'But, if you only help one of us, Yamato,\nit wouldn't be fair.'%K%P
'That's right!\nBut we'll make Yamato cry if we leave him out...'%K%P
'I won't cry!'%K%P
'Oh, so you're OK with being left out?'%K%P
'Sorry, Yamato.\nThis is all just part of our showdown.\nYou'll just have to be okay on your own for a bit.'%K%P
'You guys...'%K%P
'Mwahahaaah! I'm joking!\nIt's really not that big a deal, whatever you do.'%K%P
'Yeah, Kagura's right.\nYou can just kind of hang about, like you always do.'%K%P
'So nothing's changing?'%K%P
I grumbled.\nIt looked like no one wanted to pin down my new role.%K%P
With the two of them going\ninto serious competition, I could understand\nthem wanting to keep me around for comfort.%K%P
I too, was happier keeping my position vague.%K%P
